author: namngrg
content:
hey <@688748669268132001> I am looking to learn more about SSLE. Do you have any resources? I gave a read to https://ethresear.ch/t/secret-non-single-leader-election/11789.
Would love to connect with you and work on this for EPF üôè

author: dapplion
content: Sure! The intent on this proposal is to explore in greater depth its safety. This particular implementation would be preferred above Whisk since it's much simper, but it's possible that is vulnerable to attacks and causes issues to the fork-choice. I would suggest to explore how our fork-choice handles multiple valid blocks per slot. <@862973562243252234> would you suggest any different direction to explore first?
